pages.text: yemeleyawi k’eni lehulumi k’et’erwachewi newi፡፡
zemedi kezemedu mininimi yemayit’ek’imibeti inerisumi yemayiriredubeti k’eni newi፡፡
alahi yazeneleti sewina yamene bicha sik’eri፡፡ (irisusi yiriredali)፡፡ irisu ashenafiwi azanyu newina፡፡
yezek’ume zafi
yehat’i’atenyawi migibi newi፡፡
inide zeyiti atela newi፡፡ behodochi wisit’i yemifela sihoni፡፡
inide genefele wiha afelali (yemifela sihoni)፡፡
yazuti፤ wede gehanemi mekakelimi behayili gotituti፡፡
keziyami «kerasu belayi kefela wiha sik’ayi anibwabubeti፡፡»
«k’imesi፤ anite ashenafiwi kibiru nehina» (yibalali)፡፡
«yihi ya be’irisu tit’erat’erubeti yeneberachihuti newi» (yibalalu)፡፡
t’inik’uk’ochu be’irigit’i bets’et’itenya menoriya wisit’i nachewi፡፡
be’atikilitochina beminich’ochi wisit’i nachewi፡፡
fiti lefiti yetek’it’ach’u honewi kesisi harina kewefirami hari yilebisalu፡፡
(negeru) inidezihu newi፤ ‘ayinamawochi yehonuni nech’ach’i setochimi inat’enadachewaleni፡፡
be’iriswami wisit’i yetemamenu honewi፤ kefirafire hulu yazizalu፡፡
yefitenyayituni moti iniji (dagimenya) be’iriswa wisit’i motini ayik’emisumi፡፡ yegehaneminimi k’it’ati (alahi) t’ebek’achewi፡፡
kegetahi behone chirota (t’ebek’achewi)፡፡ yihi irisu talak’i ‘idili newi፡፡
(k’uri’anuni) bek’wanik’wahimi yageranewi (hizibochihi) yigenezebu zenidi bicha newi፡፡
tet’ebabek’imi inerisu tet’ebabak’iwochi nachewina፡፡
